name: Função ST
Checa se o Sensor está OFF!
Tema 1
format:
<style>
    /* cuida de imagens e cores do fundo da pagina */
    body {
        background-image: url("https://img.freepik.com/vetores-gratis/fundo-abstrato-aquarela_23-2149056656.jpg?w=2000") !important;
        background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
        background-size: cover !important;
        background-position: center centet !important;
    }

    /* cuida da transparencia da barra de titulo */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar {
        background-color: transparent !important;
    }

    /* cuida da transperancia dos botões dos cartões */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
        background-color: transparent !important;
    }

    /* cuida da transparencia de fundo do menu */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav {
        background-color: transparent !important;
    }

    /* cuida do arredondamento do item selecionado no menu */
    button.md-no-style {
        border-radius: 10px !important;
    }

    /* cuida da cor da seleção do item selecionado no menu */
    .nr-menu-item-active div button {
        border-right: 4px solid #000000 !important;
    }

    /* cuida das configurações do menu */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav div.md-list-item-inner {
        color: #000000 !important;
        /* cor das letras dos itens do menu */
        background-color: #ffffff !important;
        /* cor do fundo dos itens do menu */
        border-radius: 10px !important;
        /* cuida da curva dos cantos dos itens do menu */

    }

    /* cuida das configurações dos cartões de grupo */
    ui-card-panel {
        background-color: #00000040 !important;
        /* cuida da cor do fundo dos grupos do menu */
        border-radius: 10px !important;
        /* cuida da curva dos cantos do cartão de grupo */
    }

    /* cuida da cor do nome do cartão de grupo */
    .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
        color: #000000 !important;
    }

    /* cuida da cor do titulo da pagina */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar .md-toolbar-tools {
        color: #030303 !important;
    }
</style>

name: Tema 2
format:
<style>
    /* cuida de imagens e cores do fundo da pagina */
    body {
        background-image: url("https://static.vecteezy.com/system/resources/thumbnails/002/019/901/original/matrix-digital-background-free-video.jpg") !important;
        background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
        background-size: cover !important;
        background-position: center centet !important;
    }

    /* cuida da transparencia da barra de titulo */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar {
        background-color: transparent !important;
    }

    /* cuida da transparencia dos botões dos cartões */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
        background-color: transparent !important;
    }

    /* cuida da transperencia de fundo do menu */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav {
        background-color: transparent !important;
    }

    /* cuida do arredondamento do item selecionado no menu */
    button.md-no-style {
        border-radius: 20px !important;
    }

    /* cuida da cor da seleção do item selecionado no menu */
    .nr-menu-item-active div button {
        border-right: 4px solid #000000 !important;
    }

    /* cuida das configurações do menu */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav div.md-list-item-inner {
        color: #85E665 !important;
        /* cor das letras dos itens do menu */
        background-color: #34592795 !important;
        /* cor do fundo dos itens do menu */
        border-radius: 10px !important;
        /* cuida da curva dos cantos dos itens do menu */
    }

    /* cuida das configurações dos cartões de grupo */
    ui-card-panel {
        background-color: transparent !important;
        //background-color: #34592795 !important;
        /* cuida da cor do fundo dos grupos do menu */
        border-radius: 10px !important;
        /* cuida da curva dos cantos do cartão de grupo */
    }

    /* cuida da cor do nome do cartão de grupo */
    .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
        color: #85E665 !important;
    }

    /* cuida da cor do titulo da pagina */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar .md-toolbar-tools {
        color: #85E665 !important;
    }
</style>

name: Tema 3
format:
<style>
    /* cuida de imagens e cores do fundo da pagina */
    body {
        background-image: url("https://abstartups.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/office-wallpaper.jpg") !important;
        background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
        background-size: cover !important;
        background-position: center centet !important;
    }

    /* cuida da transparencia da barra de titulo */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar {
        background-color: transparent !important;
    }

    /* cuida da transparencia dos botões dos cartões */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
        background-color: transparent !important;
    }

    /* cuida da transparencia de fundo do menu */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav {
        background-color: transparent !important;
    }

    /* cuida do arredondamento do item selecionado no menu */
    button.md-no-style {
        border-radius: 10px !important;
    }

    /* cuida da cor da seleção do item selecionado no menu */
    .nr-menu-item-active div button {
        border-right: 4px solid #000000 !important;
    }

    /* cuida das configurações do menu */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav div.md-list-item-inner {
        color: #E6CB49 !important;
        /* cor das letras dos itens do menu */
        background-color: #E6CB4940 !important;
        /* cor do fundo dos itens do menu */
        border-radius: 10px !important;
        /* cuida da curva dos cantos dos itens do menu */
    }

    /* cuida das configurações dos cartões de grupo */
    ui-card-panel {
        background-color: #E6CB4940 !important;
        /* cuida da cor do fundo dos grupos do menu */
        border-radius: 10px !important;
        /* cuida da curva dos cantos do cartão de grupo */
    }

    /* cuida da cor do nome do cartão de grupo */
    .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
        color: #5C521D !important;
    }

    /* cuida da cor do titulo da pagina */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar .md-toolbar-tools {
        color: #E6CB49 !important;
    }
</style>

name: gauge-style
format:
<style id="hotNipi-gauge">
:root{
    --needle-color:#001100;
    --needle-second-color:#ff0000;
    --red-ticks:9;
    --sec-high-color:#ff00004f;
    --sec-normal-color:#00ff004f;
    --sec-low-color:#0000ff4f;
    --sec-sub-color:#0000ff8f;
}
.g-container {
    padding-top: 3px;
    padding-bottom: 3px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    user-select:none;
}
    
.g-body {
    width: 98%;
    height: 98%;
    border-radius: 15%;
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    align-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    box-shadow: 0px 5px 8px #00000045;
    background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(78,78,78,1) 0%, rgba(215,215,215,1) 99%, rgba(236,236,236,1) 100%);
}

.g-body::before {    
    content: "";
    background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB4bWxucz0naHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcvMjAwMC9zdmcnIHdpZHRoPSc1JyBoZWlnaHQ9JzUnPgogIDxyZWN0IHdpZHRoPSc1JyBoZWlnaHQ9JzUnIGZpbGw9J3doaXRlJy8+CiAgPHBhdGggZD0nTTAgNUw1IDBaTTYgNEw0IDZaTS0xIDFMMSAtMVonIHN0cm9rZT0nIzg4OCcgc3Ryb2tlLXdpZHRoPScxJy8+Cjwvc3ZnPg=="); 
    background-repeat: repeat;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0px;
    right: 0px;
    bottom: 0px;
    left: 0px;
    opacity: 0.1;
    border-radius:15%;
}

.g-sector{
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
   
    transform-origin: 0 0;
}
.g-sector-high {
    background: var(--sec-high-color);
    transform: rotate(328deg) skew(12deg, 23deg);
}
.g-sector-normal {
    background:var(--sec-normal-color);
    transform: rotate(328deg) skew(12deg, 23deg);
}
.g-sector-low {
    background:var(--sec-low-color);
    transform: rotate(328deg) skew(12deg, 23deg);
}
.g-sector-sub {
    background:var(--sec-sub-color);
    transform: rotate(328deg) skew(12deg, 23deg);
}

.g-ring {
    width: 94%;
    height: 94%;
    border-radius: 50%;
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    align-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(78,78,78,1) 0%, rgba(215,215,215,1) 99%, rgba(236,236,236,1) 100%);
}
.g-plate {
    overflow: hidden;
    width: 93%;
    height: 93%;
    border-radius: 50%;
    position: relative;
    box-shadow: inset 0 0 15px #000000a3;
    background: radial-gradient(circle, #dd8400 3%, rgb(196 205 209) 1%, rgb(177 183 186) 40%, rgb(191 193 194) 100%);
}
.g-plate-bright {
    overflow:hidden;
    width: 90%;
    height: 90%;
    border-radius: 50%;
    position: relative;
    box-shadow: inset 0 0 10px yellow;
    background: radial-gradient(circle, #ed9400 3%, rgb(255, 255, 255) 1%, rgb(255, 255, 158) 40%, rgb(148, 154, 160) 100%);
}


.g-ticks {
    position: absolute;
    top:0;
    left:0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 4px 6px black);
}
.g-tick {
    transform: rotate(calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) + 45deg)));
    background: #000;
    position: relative;
    left: 0;
    top: 50%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 1px;
    margin-bottom: -1px;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(0,0,0,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0) 2%,rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 2%,rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 10%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 10%);
}
.g-subtick {
    transform: rotate(calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-subtick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-subtick-count)) + 45deg)));
    background: #000;
    position: relative;
    left: 0;
    top: 50%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 1px;
    margin-bottom: -1px;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(0,0,0,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0) 2%,rgb(0 0 0 / 40%) 2%,rgb(0 0 0 / 40%) 6%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 6%);
}

.g-num {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    text-align: center;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(270deg /
    var(--ga-tick-count)) + 45deg))) translate(calc(-1px * var(--container-size) * var(--gn-distance))) rotate(calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) *-1 -
    calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count))*-1 - 45deg)));
}

.g-nums {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    color: #000000a1;
    font-size: calc(var(--container-size) * 20%);
    font-weight: 500;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 4px 10px black);
}
.g-needle {
    transform: rotate(calc(270deg * calc(var(--gauge-value, 0deg) / 100) - 45deg));
    transition: transform 1s;
    background: #000;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 49%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 2%;
    filter:drop-shadow(0px 1px 3px #00000080);
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(2,0,36,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0) 15%,var(--needle-color) 15%,var(--needle-color) 50%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 50%);
}
.g-needle-second {
    transform: rotate(calc(270deg * calc(var(--gauge-value-second, 0deg) / 100) - 45deg));
    transition: transform 1s;
    background: #000;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 49%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 2%;
    filter:drop-shadow(0px 1px 3px #ff000080);  
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(2,0,36,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0) 15%,var(--needle-second-color) 15%,var(--needle-second-color) 50%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 50%);
}
.g-needle-ring {
    position: absolute;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5%);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5%);
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    background: var(--needle-color);
    border-radius: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 4px #0000009c;
}
.g-val{
    position: absolute;
    text-align: center;
    left: 50%;
    bottom: 8%;
    width: 80px;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    font-family: monospace;
    font-size:  calc(var(--container-size) * 40%);
    color: #000000a1;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 3px 2px #00000050);
}

.g-label{
    position: absolute;
    text-align: center;
    left: 50%;
    top: 58%;
    width: 100%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    font-family: monospace;
    font-size:  calc(var(--container-size) * 18%);
    color: #000000a1;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 3px 2px #00000080);
}
.g-label::after{
    content: var(--g-unit);
    font-size: clamp(1em,calc(var(--container-size) * 40%),1.5em);
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}
.g-rivets{
    position: absolute;
    left:0;
    top:0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}

.g-rivet {
    position: absolute;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 2px);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 2px);
    border-radius: 50px;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #adadad 0%,#d3d3d3 51%,#d1d1d1 68%,#8c8c8c 100%);
    box-shadow: 0px 2px 4px #000, -1px -1px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
    border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(1){
    top:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    left:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(2){
    top:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    right:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(3){
    bottom:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    left:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(4){
    bottom:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    right:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}

.g-rivet::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    left: 50%;
    top: 50%;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 10%);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 10%);
    box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 2px #222;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    border-radius: 50%;
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
}
</style>

    font-size: calc(var(--container-size) * 20%);
    font-weight: 500;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 4px 10px black);
}
.g-needle {
    transform: rotate(calc(270deg * calc(var(--gauge-value, 0deg) / 100) - 45deg));
    transition: transform 1s;
    background: #000;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 49%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 2%;
    filter:drop-shadow(0px 1px 3px #00000080);
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(2,0,36,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0) 15%,var(--needle-color) 15%,var(--needle-color) 50%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 50%);
}
.g-needle-second {
    transform: rotate(calc(270deg * calc(var(--gauge-value-second, 0deg) / 100) - 45deg));
    transition: transform 1s;
    background: #000;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 49%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 2%;
    filter:drop-shadow(0px 1px 3px #ff000080);  
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(2,0,36,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0) 15%,var(--needle-second-color) 15%,var(--needle-second-color) 50%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 50%);
}
.g-needle-ring {
    position: absolute;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5%);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5%);
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    background: var(--needle-color);
    border-radius: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 4px #0000009c;
}
.g-val{
    position: absolute;
    text-align: center;
    left: 50%;
    bottom: 8%;
    width: 80px;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    font-family: monospace;
    font-size:  calc(var(--container-size) * 40%);
    color: #000000a1;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 3px 2px #00000050);
}

.g-label{
    position: absolute;
    text-align: center;
    left: 50%;
    top: 58%;
    width: 100%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    font-family: monospace;
    font-size:  calc(var(--container-size) * 18%);
    color: #000000a1;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 3px 2px #00000080);
}
.g-label::after{
    content: var(--g-unit);
    font-size: clamp(1em,calc(var(--container-size) * 40%),1.5em);
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}
.g-rivets{
    position: absolute;
    left:0;
    top:0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}

.g-rivet {
    position: absolute;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 2px);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 2px);
    border-radius: 50px;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #adadad 0%,#d3d3d3 51%,#d1d1d1 68%,#8c8c8c 100%);
    box-shadow: 0px 2px 4px #000, -1px -1px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
    border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(1){
    top:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    left:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(2){
    top:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    right:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(3){
    bottom:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    left:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(4){
    bottom:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    right:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}

.g-rivet::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    left: 50%;
    top: 50%;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 10%);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 10%);
    box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 2px #222;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    border-radius: 50%;
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
}
</style>

name: gauge-style
format:
<style id="hotNipi-gauge">
:root{
    --needle-color:#001100;
    --sec-high-color:#ff00004f;
    --sec-normal-color:#00ff004f;
}
.g-container {
    padding-top: 3px;
    padding-bottom: 3px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    user-select:none;
}
    
.g-body{
    width:98%;
    height:98%;
    border-radius:15%;
    position:relative;
    display: flex;
    align-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    box-shadow: 0px 5px 8px #00000045;
    background:linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(78,78,78,1) 0%, rgba(215,215,215,1) 99%, rgba(236,236,236,1) 100%);
}

.g-body::before {    
    content: "";
    background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB4bWxucz0naHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcvMjAwMC9zdmcnIHdpZHRoPSc1JyBoZWlnaHQ9JzUnPgogIDxyZWN0IHdpZHRoPSc1JyBoZWlnaHQ9JzUnIGZpbGw9J3doaXRlJy8+CiAgPHBhdGggZD0nTTAgNUw1IDBaTTYgNEw0IDZaTS0xIDFMMSAtMVonIHN0cm9rZT0nIzg4OCcgc3Ryb2tlLXdpZHRoPScxJy8+Cjwvc3ZnPg=="); 
    background-repeat: repeat;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0px;
    right: 0px;
    bottom: 0px;
    left: 0px;
    opacity: 0.1;
    border-radius:15%;
}

.g-ring{
    width:90%;
    height:90%;
    border-radius:50%;
    position:relative;
    display: flex;
    align-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
   
    background:linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(78,78,78,1) 0%, rgba(215,215,215,1) 99%, rgba(236,236,236,1) 100%);;
}
.g-plate {
    overflow:hidden;
    width: 90%;
    height: 90%;
    border-radius: 50%;
    position: relative;
    box-shadow: inset 0 0 15px black;
    background: radial-gradient(circle, #dd8400 3%, rgb(196 205 209) 1%, rgb(177 183 186) 40%, rgb(108 114 120) 100%);
}
.g-sector{
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
   
    transform-origin: 0 0;
}
.g-sector-high {
    background: var(--sec-high-color);
    transform: rotate(329deg) skew(12deg, 23deg);
}
.g-sector-normal {
    background:var(--sec-normal-color);
    transform: rotate(329deg) skew(12deg, 23deg);
}
.g-ticks {
    position: absolute;
    top:0;
    left:0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 4px 6px black);
}
.g-tick {
    transform: rotate(calc(27deg * var(--ga-tick) - 71deg));
    background: #000;
    position: relative;
    left: 0;
    top: 50%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 1%;
    margin-bottom: -1%;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(0,0,0,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0) 2%,rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 2%,rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 10%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 10%);
}
.g-num {
    position: absolute;
}
.g-nums {
    position: absolute;
    top:0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    color: #000000a1;
    font-size: calc(var(--container-size) * 16%);
    font-weight: 500;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 4px 6px black);
}
.g-needle {
    transform: rotate(calc(270deg * calc(var(--g-angle, 0deg) / 99) - 45deg));
    transition: transform 1s;
    background: #000;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 49%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 2%;
    filter:drop-shadow(0px 1px 3px #00000080);
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(2,0,36,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0) 15%,var(--needle-color) 15%,var(--needle-color) 50%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 50%);
}
.g-needle-ring {
    position: absolute;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5%);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5%);
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    background: var(--needle-color);
    border-radius: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 4px #0000009c;
}
.g-val{
    position: absolute;
    text-align: center;
    left: 50%;
    bottom: 8%;
    width: 80px;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    font-family: monospace;
    font-size:  calc(var(--container-size) * 40%);
    color: #000000a1;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 3px 2px #00000080);
}
.g-label{
    position: absolute;
    text-align: center;
    left: 50%;
    top: 55%;
    width: 100%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    font-family: monospace;
    font-size:  calc(var(--container-size) * 18%);
    color: #000000a1;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 3px 2px #00000080);
}
.g-rivets{
    position: absolute;
    left:0;
    top:0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}

.g-rivet {
    position: absolute;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 2px);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 2px);
    border-radius: 50px;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #adadad 0%,#d3d3d3 51%,#d1d1d1 68%,#8c8c8c 100%);
    box-shadow: 0px 2px 4px #000, -1px -1px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
    border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(1){
    top:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    left:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(2){
    top:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    right:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(3){
    bottom:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    left:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(4){
    bottom:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    right:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}

.g-rivet::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    left: 50%;
    top: 50%;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 10%);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 10%);
    box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 2px #222;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    border-radius: 50%;
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3);

:root{

}
.g-container {

}

.g-body::before {    
    content: "";
    background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB4bWxucz0naHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcvMjAwMC9zdmcnIHdpZHRoPSc1JyBoZWlnaHQ9JzUnPgogIDxyZWN0IHdpZHRoPSc1JyBoZWlnaHQ9JzUnIGZpbGw9J3doaXRlJy8+CiAgPHBhdGggZD0nTTAgNUw1IDBaTTYgNEw0IDZaTS0xIDFMMSAtMVonIHN0cm9rZT0nIzg4OCcgc3Ryb2tlLXdpZHRoPScxJy8+Cjwvc3ZnPg=="); 
    background-repeat: repeat;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0px;
    right: 0px;
    bottom: 0px;
    left: 0px;
    opacity: 0.1;
    border-radius:15%;
}

    width: 94%;
    height: 94%;
    border-radius: 50%;
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    align-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(78,78,78,1) 0%, rgba(215,215,215,1) 99%, rgba(236,236,236,1) 100%);
}
.g-plate {
    overflow: hidden;
    width: 93%;
    height: 93%;

}
.g-tick {
    transform: rotate(calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) + 45deg)));
    background: #000;
    position: relative;
    left: 0;
    top: 50%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 1px;
    margin-bottom: -1px;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(0,0,0,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0) 2%,rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 2%,rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 10%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 10%);
}
.g-subtick {
    transform: rotate(calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-subtick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-subtick-count)) + 45deg)));
    background: #000;
    position: relative;
    left: 0;
    top: 50%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 1px;
    margin-bottom: -1px;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(0,0,0,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0) 2%,rgb(0 0 0 / 40%) 2%,rgb(0 0 0 / 40%) 6%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 6%);
}

.g-num {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    text-align: center;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(270deg /
    var(--ga-tick-count)) + 45deg))) translate(calc(-1px * var(--container-size) * var(--gn-distance))) rotate(calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) *-1 -
    calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count))*-1 - 45deg)));
}

.g-nums {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    color: #000000a1;

name: switch_swg
function 6
RFID Scanner
info:
This flow receives the UID from the RFID scanner
via MQTT. The RFID tags are compared against 
several workflow options, such as disco, train,etc.

A grant/deny message is sent back to the RFID
scanner, using the Homie convention. 
https://github.com/marvinroger/homie

Complete write-up on the IoL blog:
www.InterentOfLEGO.com

written by 
Cory Guynn
2016

name: README
info:
#RFID SCANNER

* This flow listens to an RFID scanner via MQTT.

* A switch node then assigns a workflow based on
the 'uid' received.

* An authorization message is sent back to the device 
by setting the 'validate' property.

##Device Info 
* WeMos d1-mini (ESP8266 dev board)
http://www.wemos.cc/Products/d1_mini.html

* RFID RC522
http://playground.arduino.cc/Learning/MFRC522

* Homie MQTT framework
https://github.com/marvinroger/homie/tree/master




## Written by Cory Guynn, 2016
www.InternetOfLEGO.com

name: RFID-1 Log
format:
Event Log

  • {{x.topic}}
    • {{x.payload}}

name: Store and shift msg
store Homie state
RFID-1 State
format:
{{msg.payload.name}}

{{msg.payload.online === 'true' ? 'ONLINE' : 'OFFLINE'}}

{{key}} {{ value }}

name: CSS
format:
<style>
.title{
    font-size: 1.4em;
    color: red !important;
    border-left: 6px solid orange;
}
.save button:hover {
  /*width: 50%;*/
  background-color: #4CAF50; 
  color: black !important;
}
.save button  {
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  text-align: center;
  width: 50% ;
  transition-duration: 0.4s;
  background-color: #ddffdd;
  color: white;         
}
